Home.title: We create services to help others build theirs
Home.description: Experts in the creation of specialized applications and services for independents and small businesses
Home.dedale_description: Dédale is a free service to create, develop and organize e-mail templates with ease.
Home.all_posts_subtitle: Find out more about Bireme Lab and our latest news.

Dedale.meta_title: Create, develop and centralize email templates in your browser
Dedale.meta_description: Dédale is a free online service to help developers and companies develop their e-mail templates quickly and easily.
Dedale.title: The next-generation e-mail template development environment
Dedale.description: Dédale is a <primary>free code editor</primary> for developers looking to integrate their e-mail templates using React.js from their browser.
Dedale.integrate_to: Integrates quickly and easily with these tools
Dedale.integrate_to_tooltip: The tools shown are examples, and any HTML-compatible service can be used.
Dedale.features_title: Everything you need to create high-performance email templates
Dedale.features_description: The ideal tool to help you build a coherent brand image through email communication, while dedicating as little time as possible
Dedale.feature_1_title: Optimal development experience in your browser
Dedale.feature_1_description: Designed by developers, for developers, Dedale offers an optimized development environment for email development. Native editor, automatic dependency installation, real-time preview, TypeScript support.
Dedale.feature_2_description: Ensure the consistency of your templates by previewing a near-realistic rendering thanks to Dedale's variable system.
Dedale.feature_3_description: With Dedale, you can export your email templates in one click to use them in your favorite services.
Dedale.feature_4_description: Dedale automatically detects the compatibility of your email templates with the Can I Email database. Ensure the compatibility of your templates with the most popular email clients like Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.
Dedale.react_email_description: Dedale is designed to add a layer to React Email, an optimized environment dedicated to email template development.
Dedale.pricing_title: A free service accessible with or without registration
Dedale.pricing_description: Dedale is accessible for free, with or without creating an account:
Dedale.faq_description: We have gathered most of the frequently asked questions to clarify the most important points
Dedale.faq_question_1: Can I import my existing email templates?
Dedale.faq_answer_1: You can manually import your existing email templates in React Email format.
Dedale.faq_answer_2: Yes, Dedale is a completely free service. However, storage limitations within browser data restrict some features. For a better user experience, you can create a free account.
Dedale.faq_question_3: Do I need to create an account to use Dedale?
Dedale.faq_answer_3: No, you can use Dedale without creating an account. However, we have limited the use of some features. For a better user experience, we recommend creating a free account.
Dedale.faq_question_4: What advantages does Dedale offer in addition to React Email?
Dedale.faq_answer_4: React Email allows you to create templates using React to simplify the development and maintenance of your email templates. Dedale provides the following enhancements: an online and optimized development environment for email design, real-time template preview, and a variable system.
Dedale.faq_question_5: Can I integrate Dedale with my email service?
Dedale.faq_answer_5: With Dedale, you can export your email template in a highly compatible HTML format with most existing professional tools.
Dedale.pricing_option_description_1: Access to most features with limitations
Dedale.pricing_disclaimer: * Templates are stored locally in the browser, they may be lost if browsing data is cleared
Dedale.ready_to_test_description: Enter your email to be informed, in advance, of Dedale's public release as well as upcoming features in development
